titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Institute for Soviet American Relations records
Institute for Soviet American Relations records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Nicholas Shmelev

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-02T15:15-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: August 25th 2014: Container list added by Nicholas Shmelev.

did.unittitle: Institute for Soviet American Relations records
did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, proposals, financial records, serial issues, and other printed matter relating to Soviet-American cultural relations, relations between the United States and the successor states to the Soviet Union, and environmental programs in those states.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Institute for Soviet American Relations records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2007.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Institute for Soviet American Relations, established in 1983, is a private American nonprofit organization for the promotion of cultural relations between the United States and the Soviet Union.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, proposals, financial records, serial issues, and other printed matter relating to Soviet-American cultural relations, relations between the United States and the successor states to the Soviet Union, and environmental programs in those states.
